name: Great NEW Music for Doom2 only.
description: This has all new music for the first 7 levels, and they are ALL Green Day. If you don't like Green Day, forget this wad! All midis were patched from Mike Fisher's great GREATMUS.WAD. Check it out, it's on FTP.CDROM.COM. I also added some of my favourite sound effects. See below. If you have any other Green Day midis, or know where I could get them, please e-mail me.
